ComicInfo.Summary:
Just Looking: Betty is hired by an old man for something other than her usual specialty.
The Grass Is Always Greener...: Betty envies her friend Rachel's life as a respected single mother and corporate secretary. What she doesn't know is that Rachel envies Betty's entrepreneurial freedom.
Bondage Palace, Part 3: While The Blonde tortures information on the location of the Youth Formula out of Agent K-89, Popess Crimelda does the same to Matilda X-15. They both end up meeting at Amita Berg's apartment.
